subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: File from tonight
author: bruce halliday
full_text:
--_2c58c415-1fa5-4ed4-bedd-7b41fc74321a_
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable


Robin,
 
I agree with Steve on a couple of points. First let me say that I=

do believe that we all have a "technician/guide/guardian" call them what y=
ou
may. but I usually call them by the names they introduced themselves by.=

 
I know for a fact through many, many, many box sessions that when I turn=

a box on, could be Frank's box or the minibox or the RS 470 does not matte=
r which.
 
The same two entities will come through immediately, So much so =
now, that I do not even ask for conformation that
it is in fact them. I rec=
ognise their individual voice patterns. I have built a solid relationship w=
ith these two spirits
I know as mike and Lisa so much so that I have even g=
otten to know their individual personalities.
 
There are other newer resea=
rchers here that will attest to the fact that when they where doing their f=
irst sessions
I had asked my two "Friends" Mike and Lisa to assist in getti=
ng them started and invariably the spirits that came 
through to these new =
researchers during their first sessions identified themselves as Mike and L=
isa.
 
Steve says he does not turn on his box and use them as a crutch, tha=
t is not entirely true. I had done research 
very closely with Steve until =
recently and I would venture to say that 99% if not every session he starts=
 with "Mike & Lisa
are you available to talk with me" 
 
Also I don't consi=
der working with my technicians as using them as a crutch, They would not a=
llow that.
They are not there like butlers at our beckoned call when we fee=
l they may be of some use.
Quite the opposite, without them we would get no=
 communication at all, they are allowing us the honor of receiving this 
ce=
lestial communication. They are the moderators, facilitators and generators=
 of all we hear and send to and from the spirit realm.
And they also stand =
as guards and protectors to do the best they can to keep us from being dece=
ived or taken down a dark path.
 
Some here wait for others to state an opi=
nion and then tend to agree with that opinion no matter what they have expe=
rienced to be true.
 
Robin, my advice to you as a new researcher in this f=
ield. Form your own beliefs through your experience and research.
Listen an=
d learn from others but do not let what you believe to be true or not, be s=
wayed by popular opinion.
 
Bruce
Bruce Halliday 


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups=
.comFrom: MudPuddleFarm@...: Sat, 2 Feb 2008 21:42:09 -0800Subject:=
 Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: File from tonight






Steve,
 
I certainly appreciate =
your thoughts.  In the back of my mind is always the question of whether we=
 are being Deceived.  Just for the sake of argument, is it POSSIBLE we're b=
eing manipulated by something evil?  I'm not frightened, and I won't stop m=
y own research (the negative stuff just makes me more determined), but my m=
ind does go there sometimes.  I hope that along with developing my "ear" I =
can acquire the gift of discernment.
 
Robin
 
 

----- Original Message --=
--- 
From: Steve Hultay 
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
Sent: Saturday, Febru=
ary 02, 2008 8:57 PM
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: File from tonight:


Robin,If i=
 may add my thoughts on this: There is no concrete evidence of who or what =
comes through is what they say they are. Technicians i have found were used=
 to get you up and running and i only now call on them if i need assistance=
. I don't turn the boxes on and ask for them like a crutch, i conduct my se=
ssion and if i need help they will supply it to me if needed. I think the w=
hole idea is to find out who we are communicating with, maybe we will never=
 really know for sure but i still try and find out as best as i can. -Steve=
 H.--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Robin Searcy Henson" <MudPuddleFarm@...=
> wrote:>> Hi Frank, > > When you mention being distrustful of what comes t=
hrough the boxes, are you saying you're skeptical of the "technicians" bein=
g who they say they are? Not trying to open another can of worms here, just=
 wanting to continue learning from your experience and research. I get what=
 you're saying about becoming obsessive with the sessions. I've probably as=
ked you this a half dozen times over the last couple of years, but who or w=
hat do YOU think you're/we're communicating with?> > Robin> > > ----- Origi=
nal Message ----- > From: purplespacefriend<mailto:purplealiengirl@...> > T=
o: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com<mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com> > Sent: Saturday=
, February 02, 2008 7:46 PM> Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: File from tonight> > > =
Have ya tried EVPmaker? It is based on that random principle, and > predate=
s the boxes.> > I've heard this stuff before, about random being the best, =
and I > have to disaggree. I also think it unwise to spend every waking > m=
oment doing sessions. I think it creates that expectation, and > perhaps de=
speration to make contact, and I would tend not to trust > what comes throu=
gh. > > I don't trust some of this stuff because I have yet get any > meani=
ngful assistence with the boxes from the so called technicians. > All I eve=
r got was a telepathic "suggestion" to use the echo boxes. > Everything els=
e was a assemblage of stuff I had worked on in hte past > to solve the prob=
lem of "what else could I use". > > I hate to see yet another go down the r=
oad of "this is the onlyest > way". > > Frank-S>

Robin,<BR>
 <BR>
I agree with Steve on a couple of points.=
 First let me say that I<BR>
do believe that we all have a "technician/guid=
e/guardian" call them what you<BR>
may. but I usually call them by the name=
s they introduced themselves by.<BR>
 <BR>
I know for a fact through m=
any, many, many box sessions that when I turn<BR>
a box on, could be Frank'=
s box or the minibox or the RS 470 does not matter which.<BR>
 <BR>
Th=
e same two entities will come through immediately, So much so now, that I d=
o not even ask for conformation that<BR>
it is in fact them. I recognise th=
eir individual voice patterns. I have built a solid relationship with these=
 two spirits<BR>
I know as mike and Lisa so much so that I have even gotten=
 to know their individual personalities.<BR>
 <BR>
There are other new=
er researchers here that will attest to the fact that when they where doing=
 their first sessions<BR>
I had asked my two "Friends" Mike and Lisa to ass=
ist in getting them started and invariably the spirits that came <BR>
throu=
gh to these new researchers during their first sessions identified themselv=
es as Mike and Lisa.<BR>
 <BR>
Steve says he does not turn on his box =
and use them as a crutch, that is not entirely true. I had done research <B=
R>
very closely with Steve until recently and I would venture to say that 9=
9% if not every session he starts with "Mike & Lisa<BR>
are you availab=
le to talk with me" <BR>
 <BR>
Also I don't consider working with my t=
echnicians as using them as a crutch, They would not allow that.<BR>
They a=
re not there like butlers at our beckoned call when we feel they may be of =
some use.<BR>
Quite the opposite, without them we would get no communicatio=
n at all, they are allowing us the honor of receiving this <BR>
celestial c=
ommunication. They are the moderators, facilitators and generators of all w=
e hear and send to and from the spirit realm.<BR>
And they also stand as gu=
ards and protectors to do the best they can to keep us from being deceived =
or taken down a dark path.<BR>
 <BR>
Some here wait for others to stat=
e an opinion and then tend to agree with that opinion no matter what they h=
ave experienced to be true.<BR>
 <BR>
Robin, my advice to you as a new=
 researcher in this field. Form your own beliefs through your experience an=
d research.<BR>
Listen and learn from others but do not let what you believ=
e to be true or not, be swayed by popular opinion.<BR>

Bruce<BR>=
